dataCollected.title: Data We Collect
dataCollected.content: We only collect anonymous geographical location data based on your IP address to improve user experience. We do not collect any personal data or identify you individually.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: Our website uses local cookies solely for functionality and preference storage. We do not share or store these cookies remotely, respecting your privacy and security.

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Data
dataUsage.content: The collected geographical data helps us understand general usage patterns and improve the service. This data is processed anonymously and not linked to any individual.

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing
dataSharing.content: We do not share, sell, or disclose any data collected to third parties.

userRights.title: Your Rights
userRights.content: You have the right to inquire about the data we collect and how it is used. For any questions or privacy concerns, please contact us via the feedback form or email.
